Title: Establishes a first amendment and free inquiry code of conduct at all state colleges and universities
Summary: Establishes a first amendment and free inquiry code of conduct at all state colleges and universities; provides a one year statute of limitations to bring an action for a violation of such code of conduct.
LawCode: Add ยง6438-a, Ed L; amd ยง215, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing first amendment and free inquiry code of conduct at all state colleges and universities; and to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to bringing an action for a violation of a first amendment and free inquiry code of conduct within one year
